title: Reduce the Foreign Accent from your English Speech
description: A web application that leverages machine learning to help users reduce their foreign accents in English speech. Examples of use cases include pronunciation training and improving video voice-over with a native accent.

title: Distorted Document Image Rectification using Deep Learning
description: A project that leverages deep learning with traditional geometric techniques to rectify images of distorted documents. The application aims to enhance document scanning using mobile devices by enabling automatic rectification of rather complex distortions.

title: Prompt Enhancement for AI Tools
description: A web application that utilizes prompt engineering techniques to help users produce more detailed prompts for image generation. The purpose is to assist users in turning vague wordings into expressive descriptions so that they can generate the exact pictures in their minds effortlessly.

title: Generating Anime Character Faces with StyleGAN2
description: A program that generates anime faces randomly. It also involves a novel approach to control facial attributes of the output, such as hair color and hairstyle, by selecting example outputs with the desired features. The goal is to help artists brainstorm and gain inspiration during character design.

title: Data Explorer on COVID19
description: A desktop application that visualizes data related to COVID-19 data, such as case counts, deaths, and vaccination rates, from around the world using various forms, such as graphs and tables. The application aims to provide an insightful and informative presentation of COVID-19 data.
